tech_news.title: Eight Nintendo Switch Exclusives Are 50% Off In Walmart's Black Friday Sale - GameSpot
tech_news.description: Nintendo's official Black Friday Sale includes Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door, Super Mario Odyssey, Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom, and more great Switch exclusives.

tech_news.title: RAM prices are so out of control that stores are selling it like lobster - The Verge
tech_news.description: The RAM shortage is forcing stores like Central Computer and Micro Center to sell PC memory at market prices instead of advertising prices.

tech_news.title: Best Black Friday TV deals 2025: Save up to $1,300 on OLED TVs - Mashable
tech_news.description: Plenty of 2025 models from Hisense, TCL, and Samsung are at record-low prices.

tech_news.title: Black Friday Streaming Deals Offered By Hulu, Disney+, HBO Max, Peacock & More - Deadline
tech_news.description: With streaming starting to heat up during the holiday season, several major providers are rolling out Black Friday deals in an effort to entice subscribers.

tech_news.title: Meta’s new wearables trade-in program gives you Ray-Ban and Oakley discounts - The Verge
tech_news.description: For the first time, Meta is offering trade-in discounts for last-gen smart glasses and even earbuds, but only for the next month.

tech_news.title: Amazon’s Infamous ‘No Console Required’ Xbox Bundle is Back On Sale for Black Friday 2025 - IGN
tech_news.description: Amazon's ‘No Console Required’ Xbox bundle that comes with a Pulse Cipher Xbox controller, a Fire TV Stick 4K, and one month of Game Pass Ultimate is 48% off for Black Friday, dropping its price from $149.97 to $77.97.

tech_news.title: Level Up Your Look: Xbox and Crocs Launch Exclusive Gaming-Inspired Classic Clogs - Xbox Wire
tech_news.description: Xbox and Crocs have teamed up to release limited edition controller-inspired clogs and game-centric Jibbitz charms.
